v.v: Those whom God has forgiven for rebelling against him
Those whose record of sins Yahweh has erased
When I did not confess my sins,
Day and night, Yahweh, you punished me severely.
Then I confessed my sins to you;
Therefore the people who honor you should pray to you
You are like a place where I can hide from my enemies;
Yahweh says to me, “I will instruct you about how you should conduct your life.
Do not be stupid like horses and mules that do not understand anything;
Wicked people will have many troubles that will make them sad,
So, all you righteous people, rejoice about what Yahweh has done for you;
You righteous people should shout joyfully to Yahweh
Praise Yahweh as you play songs on the harp.
Sing a new song to him;
Yahweh always does what he says that he will do;
He loves everything that we do that is just and right.
Yahweh created everything in the sky by commanding it.
He gathered all the water into one huge mass
Everyone on the earth should honor Yahweh;
When he spoke, he created the world.
Yahweh stops the other nations from doing the things they want to do.
But what Yahweh decides to do will last forever.
Yahweh blesses our nation, we who worship him;
Yahweh looks down from heaven and sees all people.
From where he rules, he looks down on all the people who live on the earth.
He forms our inner beings,
It is not because a king has a great army that he is able to win battles,
It is foolish to think that because horses are very strong,
Do not forget that Yahweh watches over those who honor him,
He saves them from dying before they should die;
We trust Yahweh to help us;
We rejoice because of what he has done for us;
Yahweh, we pray that you will always faithfully love us

v: and those whose sin God does not look at,
these are the ones who are truly fortunate!
and those who no longer do deceitful things,
these are the ones who are truly fortunate!
my body was very weak and sick,
and I groaned all day long.
My strength disappeared like water that evaporates on a hot summer day.
I stopped trying to hide them.
I said to myself,
“I will tell Yahweh the wrong things that I have done.”
When I confessed them, you forgave me,
so now I am no longer guilty for my sins.
when they are in great trouble.
If they do that, difficulties will not come on them like a great flood.
you protect me from troubles
and enable me to shout, praising you for saving me from my enemies.
I will teach you and watch over you.
they need bits
so they will go in the direction you want them to go.”
but those who trust in Yahweh will experience him faithfully loving them all the time.
you whose heart are pure, be glad and shout joyfully!
